kpi.name: msc_486b
kpi.formula: (vlr1msc.intravlrintraplmnhsgsmattempt + vlr1msc.intravlrintraplmnrsgsmattempt + vlr1msc.intravlrinterplmnhsgsmattempt + vlr1msc.intravlrinterplmnrsgsmattempt + vlr1msc.periodiclocreggsmattempt + vlr1msc.intravlrintraplmnhsumtsattempt + vlr1msc.intravlrintraplmnrsumtsattempt + vlr1msc.intravlrinterplmnhsumtsattempt + vlr1msc.intravlrinterplmnrsumtsattempt + vlr1msc.periodiclocregumtsattempt)

kpi_info.title: Intra-VLR LU attempts in the target VLR (GSM and UMTS)
kpi_info.use: Indicates the total amount of location updates inside a VLR. Periodic location updates are included. For both GSM and UMTS
kpi_info.formula:
sum(
IntraVLRIntraPLMNHSGSMAttempt
+ IntraVLRIntraPLMNRSGSMAttempt
+ IntraVLRInterPLMNHSGSMAttempt
+ IntraVLRInterPLMNRSGSMAttempt
+ PeriodicLocRegGSMAttempt)
+sum(
IntraVLRIntraPLMNHSUMTSAttempt
+ IntraVLRIntraPLMNRSUMTSAttempt
+ IntraVLRInterPLMNHSUMTSAttempt
+ IntraVLRInterPLMNRSUMTSAttempt
+ PeriodicLocRegUMTSAttempt)

Counters from view(s):
RNS_PS_VLR1MSC_MSC_{time_agg},
BH Counters from view(s):
RNS_PS_VR1MCBH_MSC_{time_agg}

kpi.kpi_alias: Intra-VLR LU attempts in the target VLR (GSM and UMTS)
